name: Shoot and Bounce!
description:
• Move! using W, S, A, D
  • Grab! using Spacebar
  • Shoot! using Mouse Left Click
  • the blue circle is the player character
  • the red circle is enemies
  • white unfilled circle nearby the player character is an area to mark the grabbable area

Hi. this is my first ever game. it's one week project. please play it and I will appreciate any comments. thank you.
